body:
I don't think execute bit is lost.

```
$ ls -l $GOROOT/src/*.rc
-rwx--x--x  1 minux  staff   385 Dec  8 00:06 .../src/all.rc
-rwx--x--x  1 minux  staff   353 Dec  8 00:06 .../src/clean.rc
-rwx--x--x  1 minux  staff  2964 Dec  8 00:06 .../src/make.rc
-rwx--x--x  1 minux  staff  1436 Dec  8 00:06 .../src/run.rc
$ (cd $GOROOT/src; git status *.rc)
# On branch master
nothing to commit (working directory clean)
```
